Content.Text:
<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I really need to find a way to make that
Harvest Goddess goody-two-shoes eat a
little crow.
<PAGE>
She's a smart one, so I need to be
careful if I'm going to set a trap.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
How about if I turn her little paddling
pool into a hot spring? No, no, she'd
probably like that.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Maybe put something she hates into the
water, then? No, no, that wouldn't have
much effect.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, little <MYNAME>. Please speak up if
you are within earshot, darling.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You want to know what I was planning
just now?
<PAGE>
Will you keep quiet about it, even if I
tell you?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay, good boy. You are a good little
boy, aren't you <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll tell you, then. I'm thinking about
the Harvest Goddess.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
She and I have been at odds for a long
time now. She's always showing up and
sticking her beak in!
<PAGE>
You think so too, right? <MYNAME>?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh I knew it! We've had all sorts of
scuffles over the time we've known each
other.
<PAGE>
I was just thinking about what kind of
delicious trick I can pull on her next.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't want me to trick her?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Don't worry. I'm not going to hurt her
or anything. You are quite the little
worrier, aren't you <MYNAME>?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh very well. I won't do anything. For
now, I'll go along with you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
But I'll need you to take part in my
experiments in exchange!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee hee. There's no need to worry,
honey-bun, it won't hurt at all. Come
on, come over here.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, it looks like you really enjoyed
that. I think this is the start of a
wonderful new partnership!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What? That doesn't sound very reliable.
I'm not sharing anything with you!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Now get out of here before I turn you
into a frog!
